name: Escape The Backrooms (itch)
description:
How To Play

The backroom can only be escaped via "Gates" spread around the map, these gates can be identified by their slightly more aged appearance although it may be hard to see while running from danger. 

Escaping 

When you enter a gate, you have a chance of escaping, but more likely, you'll be sent to a random location. to increase your chance of escaping you will need to find the notes scattered around the map, when you find one hit "E" to collect it. It's even possible to escape easily within a minute if you know where to go.

Entities

Evading dangerous entities once you've been spotted will be difficult, so its best to avoid them altogether. once a hostile creature is nearby, you will be able to hear it and quickly run before it catches sight of you.

Known Bugs

  • Cursor Appears on the screen when the game starts - Alt-Tabing fixes this
  • Lighting builds while your still in the game at the beginning 

Reviews

This is my first game and not perfect so any and all critiques are welcome. I may return to build on this game, but for now it will stay in this state for the foreseeable future.
